detail_desc: Imitation leather bag with a metal-chain shoulder strap, snakeskin-patterned flap, concealed magnetic fastener and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 5.5x15.5x18.5 cm.
Knitted hat and mittens in soft cotton. Hat with a faux fur pompom and ear flaps with ties under the chin. Mittens with ribbed foldover cuffs. Sizes 0-6 months without thumbs.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede section on the front and a handle and zip at the top. Adjustable shoulder straps and two zipped outer compartments. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester. Depth 9 cm. Width 23 cm. Height 31 cm.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front and at the cuffs. Yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem.
Calf-length dress in softly draping jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a raw-edge hem. Lined at the top.
Dress in soft jersey with a glittery print motif at the top and long puff sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a sequined skirt in two layers of tulle. Satin-lined skirt.
Short-sleeved tops in cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, washed denim with embroidery and pompoms on the front, buttons at the back and patch pockets. Lined at the top.
Jumper in pattern-knit cotton. Shawl collar with a wrapover front and decorative wooden button, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, sleeveless dress in a crêpe weave with pleats at the top and a small opening at the back. Lined.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas in a printed cotton blend. Short-sleeved top with a round neck. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide, tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top. Gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Bucket hat in cotton twill with a cotton sweatband. Width of brim 9 cm.

Short running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, perforated side sections, a key pocket at the back with a concealed zip, and reflective details. Lined with short tights. Regular fit.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a stand-up collar, zip at the top and welt side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar and French front. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cropped top in soft jersey with short sleeves. Open back with crossover lacing and lace trims at the back.

Double-breasted trenchcoat in a cotton weave with a waxed finish. Notch lapels, a loose yoke front and back and buttons down the front. Side pockets, a detachable tie belt at the waist and single back vent. Unlined.
Double-layered hat in patterned cotton jersey with a small appliqué at the hem.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted dress in a viscose and Tencel™ lyocell weave with a round neckline and concealed zip at the back. Recycled polyester lining.
Strapless dress in a crinkled, patterned weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated waist and a flounce at the hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Flat cap containing some wool. Lined.
Cardigan in a soft mohair-blend knit with dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.
Long, sleeveless dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Biker jacket in pile with imitation suede details, a large collar with double tabs and a zip down the front. Welt side pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Checked wool scarf with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Slim-fit chinos in washed, stretch cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and contrasting colour trims.
Hat in a soft rib knit.
Fabric scrunchies with a shimmering pattern and decorative bow.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Short-sleeved, straight-cut shirt in thin viscose twill with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Wide, cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the back and ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit.
Elastic hairband with decorative fabric flowers.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide metal bangle.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with round toes, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Block heels 7 cm.
Leggings in stretch, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut, short-sleeved blouse in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck opening at the top and small stand-up collar with gathers and ties at the front.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Long, wrapover skirt in a crêpe weave with a press-stud fastening at the waist, tie at the hips and flounced hem. Unlined.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups at the sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Short skirt in stretch twill with a high waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Unlined.
Chinos in soft, washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Ribbed vest top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a lace trim around the neckline and armholes and an overlocked hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a bow tie or tie. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Bow tie/tie with an elastic strap and plastic fastener.

Biker body in microfibre with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, bum and thighs. Adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. The body is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy jumper in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in mulberry silk with side pockets and a welt back pocket. Zip fly, two pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners and wide, straight legs with a wide trim at the hem.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a chest pocket, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft, airy Tencel™ lyocell jersey with a slightly lower neckline at the front.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in slub cotton jersey with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, frills at the top, a seam and a flared skirt.
Straight-cut blouse in a cotton and silk crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, gathers at the top and raglan puff sleeves with ties at the ends.
Fitted, sleeveless, polo-neck top in a ribbed knit with a slight sheen.
Court shoes with pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 6 cm.
Mules with a wide foot strap, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Trainers in imitation leather with a hook and loop fastening at the front and a padded top edge. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Sunglasses with metal frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned fleece with appliqués. Embroidered hood, zip down the front, ribbing at the cuffs and hems and a detachable tail.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a wide lace trim at the back. Low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Trousers in a cool linen and cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and gently tapered legs.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
